inventory=[{"type": "item_frame", "quantity": 38, "index": 10}, {"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 31, "index": 14}, {"type": "acacia_fence", "quantity": 15, "index": 16}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 49, "index": 17}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 18}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 52, "index": 21}, {"type": "oak_leaves", "quantity": 15, "index": 22}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 14, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 11, "index": 30}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 43, "index": 33}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 45, "index": 35}, {"type": "beetroot", "quantity": 30, "index": 37}, {"type": "spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft the polished_blackstone_pressure_plate, I need to place 2 polished_blackstone next to each other in the crafting table. Since I have 2 polished_blackstone at slot 18, I will move one to slot 1.
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1
